title: Pepper and chorizo puff pastry pinwheels
ingredients: ['1 (500g) pack puff pastry', 'For the filling', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 red pepper, finely diced', '1 yellow pepper, finely diced', '200g chorizo or salami with black pepper, finely diced', '200g herbed cream cheese', '1 egg', '5 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', 'paprika']
